>
[Animal Accomplice](/Feats.aspx?ID=25) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 44 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You build a rapport with an animal, which becomes magically bonded to you. You gain a [familiar](/familiar-abilities). The type of animal is up to you, but most gnomes choose animals with a burrow Speed.
